title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Power Tool Combo Kit (DCK240C2) - the ultimate solution for all your drilling and driving needs! This dynamic duo combines the DCD771 Drill/Driver and the DCF885 Impact Driver to deliver superior performance, comfort, and versatility - all in a sleek, compact design perfect for any workspace.

The DCD771 Drill/Driver features a high-performance motor with 300 UWO output, two-speed transmission (0-450/0-1500 RPM), and a 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck for quick and easy bit changes. Its ergonomic design ensures maximum comfort and control during use, making it perfect for a wide range of applications.

The DCF885 Impact Driver is small but mighty, boasting a compact and lightweight design (5.55 inches front to back and just 2.8 lbs), and a 1/4-inch hex chuck that accepts 1-inch bit tips for convenient 1-handed loading. With three LED lights and a 20-second delay, you'll enjoy superior visibility with no shadows, making it easy to work in any lighting condition.

This combo kit includes everything you need to get started: two high-capacity 20V MAX Lithium-Ion batteries, a fast charger, and an LED foot light for superior visibility. Plus, the kit's sleek yellow and black design is as stylish as it is functional.

Whether you're a professional contractor or a DIY enthusiast, the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Power Tool Combo Kit has got you covered. Don't settle for anything less than the best - upgrade to DEWALT today!
